city.title: City
city.description: The name of the city, town, etc.. This would be “Richland” for the address: 650 Horn Rapids Road, Richland, WA 99354.

county.title: County
county.description: The name of the county containing the address.

state.title: State
state.description: The two letter code for the state. This would be “WA” for the address: 650 Horn Rapids Road, Richland, WA 99354.

street.title: Street
street.description: The name of the street, avenue, etc.. This would be “Horn Rapids Road” for the address: 650 Horn Rapids Road, Richland, WA 99354.

street_number.title: Street number
street_number.description: The building number. This would be “650” for the address: 650 Horn Rapids Road, Richland, WA 99354.

zip_code.title: Zip code
zip_code.description: The *zip_code* is the 5-digit zip code. This would be “99354” for the address: 650 Horn Rapids Road, Richland, WA 99354.
